001package nbody;
002
003import edu.princeton.cs.In;
004import edu.princeton.cs.StdDraw;
005import java.awt.Color;
006import java.io.File;
007import javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream;
008import javax.sound.sampled.AudioSystem;
009import javax.sound.sampled.Clip;
010import sun.applet.Main;
011
012/**
013 * ****************************************************************************
014 * In this class the radius of the universe is set, the number of planets is
015 * defined, the forces of the planets is made, and then the universe is
016 * simulated.
017 *
018 *
019 *
020 *****************************************************************************
021 */
022public class Universe {
023
024    private final double radius;     // radius of universe
025    private final int N;             // number of bodies
026    private final Body[] orbs;       // array of N bodies
027
028    // read universe from file
029    public Universe(String fileName) {
030
031        // the authors' version reads from standard input
032        // our version reads from a file
033        In inputStream = new In(fileName);
034
035        // number of bodies
036        N = inputStream.readInt();
037
038        // the set scale for drawing on screen
039        radius = inputStream.readDouble();
040        StdDraw.setXscale(-radius, +radius);
041        StdDraw.setYscale(-radius, +radius);
042
043        // read in the N bodies
044        orbs = new Body[N];
045        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
046            double rx = inputStream.readDouble();
047            double ry = inputStream.readDouble();
048            double vx = inputStream.readDouble();
049            double vy = inputStream.readDouble();
050            double mass = inputStream.readDouble();
051            int red = inputStream.readInt();
052            int green = inputStream.readInt();
053            int blue = inputStream.readInt();
054            int c[] = {red, green, blue};
055            double[] position = {rx, ry};
056            double[] velocity = {vx, vy};
057            Vector r = new Vector(position);
058            Vector v = new Vector(velocity);
059            orbs[i] = new Body(r, v, mass, c);
060        } // for
061    } // Universe()
062    
063//    public static void playCont(String url) {
064//    try {
065//        AudioInputStream audioInputStream = AudioSystem.getAudioInputStream(new File(url).getAbsoluteFile());
066//        Clip clip = AudioSystem.getClip();
067//        clip.open(audioInputStream);
068//        clip.loop();
069//    } catch(Exception ex) {
070//        System.out.println("Error with playing sound.");
071//        ex.printStackTrace();
072//    }
073//}
074  public static void playSound(String url) {
075    try {
076        AudioInputStream audioInputStream = AudioSystem.getAudioInputStream(new File(url).getAbsoluteFile());
077        Clip clip = AudioSystem.getClip();
078        clip.open(audioInputStream);
079        clip.start();
080    } catch(Exception ex) {
081        System.out.println("Error with playing sound.");
082        ex.printStackTrace();
083    }
084}
085    // increment time by dt units, assume forces are constant in given interval
086    public void increaseTime(double dt) {
087
088        // initialize the forces to zero
089        Vector[] f = new Vector[N];
090        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
091            f[i] = new Vector(new double[2]);
092        } // for
093
094        // compute the forces
095        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
096            for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
097                if (i != j) {
098                    f[i] = f[i].plus(orbs[i].forceFrom(orbs[j]));
099                } // if
100            } // for
101        } // for
102
103        // move the bodies
104        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
105            orbs[i].move(f[i], dt);
106            orbs[i].bounce(radius);
107        } // for
108    } // increaseTime( double )
109
110    // draw the N bodies
111    public void draw() {
112        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
113            orbs[i].draw();
114        } // for
115    } // draw()
116
117    // client to simulate a universe
118    public static void main(String[] args) {
119        Universe newton = new Universe(args[1]);
120        double dt = Double.parseDouble(args[0]);
121        while (true) {
122            StdDraw.clear(StdDraw.BLACK);
123            newton.increaseTime(dt);
124            newton.draw();
125            StdDraw.show(10);
126        } // while
127    } // main( String [] )
128} // Universe
